appShowcase.title: Shopify Video with Text Section
appShowcase.description: Present your message with impact using a structured video and text layout. This section combines visual storytelling with clear content, making it ideal for showcasing products, explaining features, or sharing brand stories in a focused and professional way.
features: Easy to manage from the Theme Editor

mainContent.heading: What is the Video with Text Section?
paragraphs: The Video with Text section is a flexible Shopify section that allows you to display a video alongside structured text content in a clean, balanced layout.

It helps store owners communicate important information clearly by combining motion with readable content. Whether you want to highlight a product feature, explain a process, or introduce your brand, this section keeps the message focused and visually engaging.
The layout is designed to fit naturally into any storefront and works well for both promotional and informational content, without overwhelming visitors.

features.title: Flexible Background
features.description: Use an image, hosted video, or video URL as the background to match your brand or campaign.

features.title: Layout & Styling
features.description: Control section height, spacing, borders, and visual balance for the video area.

features.title: Content Controls
features.description: Easily manage headings, text, colors, font sizes, and alignment for clear readability.

features.title: Interactive Elements
features.description: Optional buttons and controls to guide users or encourage action without clutter.
